| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

Note:

* PDTP-BT stands for "polydiacetylene-based polymer with a butylene spacer"
* PDTP-DTBT stands for "polydiacetylene-based polymer with a thienyl spacer"
* PDTP-DT2BT stands for "polydiacetylene-based polymer with two thienyl spacers"
